law.catch_line: Limitation of tax on coal severance for coal used in burning solid waste.
law.text: Notwithstanding the severance tax on coal, provided in this chapter, the tax on coal used for burning solid waste shall be limited to fifty cents ($0.50) per ton or four percent (4%) of the selling price per ton whichever is less.
law.history: Renumbered from KRS 224.8907(1), July 10, 1991. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 49, effective February 26, 1991 and compiled as part of KRS 224.8907.
